animals.name: Cow
animals.description: A philosophical milk-maker who believes grass is life's greatest delicacy and thinks moo-sic is the best form of communication

animals.name: Sheep
animals.description: Nature's walking sweater who dreams of becoming a cloud when it grows up - currently moonlighting as an eco-friendly lawnmower

animals.name: Pig
animals.description: A gourmet mud spa enthusiast with a master's degree in truffle hunting and a PhD in afternoon naps

animals.name: Chicken
animals.description: An aspiring alarm clock who thinks sunrise is fashionably late and believes every worm is an early bird special

animals.name: Horse
animals.description: A majestic hair model who treats every field like a runway and thinks carrots are nature's energy drinks

animals.name: Dog
animals.description: Professional tail-wagging enthusiast and certified expert in turning any human into a personal treat dispenser

animals.name: Cat
animals.description: Self-proclaimed ruler of all they survey, part-time nap consultant, and professional box inspector

animals.name: Rabbit
animals.description: Speed-hopping vegetable critic who thinks carrots are overrated and believes every garden is a salad bar

animals.name: Duck
animals.description: Aquatic fashion icon who believes bread is overrated and thinks puddles are five-star resorts

animals.name: Goat
animals.description: Aspiring parkour artist and recycling enthusiast who believes everything is potentially delicious

plants.name: Mushroom
plants.description: The fun guy of the garden who throws the best decomposition parties and makes everything around them grow. Works the night shift as a soil improvement specialist.

plants.name: Sunflower
plants.description: The eternal optimist who can't help but look on the bright side. Has a side gig as a solar panel and thinks every day is a good hair day.

plants.name: Cactus
plants.description: Desert survivalist with a prickly exterior but a heart of gold. Believes water is overrated and personal space is underrated.

plants.name: Palm Tree
plants.description: Laid-back beach enthusiast who's mastered the art of swaying in the breeze. Professional umbrella and vacation vibes provider.

plants.name: Bamboo
plants.description: Overachieving growth enthusiast who believes in reaching new heights daily. Favorite motto: 'Sky's the limit, but why stop there?'

plants.name: Rose
plants.description: Romantic soul with a flair for drama. Part-time poet, full-time beauty queen, and firm believer that every thorn has its purpose.

plants.name: Lavender
plants.description: Certified aromatherapist and meditation guru. Makes everyone around them feel calmer just by existing. Professional stress reliever.

plants.name: Tulip
plants.description: Spring fashion icon who loves starting trends. Believes in the power of power naps and always wakes up looking fabulous.

plants.name: Orchid
plants.description: High-maintenance diva with expensive taste. Requires perfect conditions but claims it's worth it. Spoiler alert: they're right.

plants.name: Bonsai
plants.description: Zen master who's mastered the art of growing old gracefully. Believes size doesn't matter and patience is more than a virtue.
